name: Santa Escape Run - Help Clumsy Santa
name_original: Santa Escape Run - Help Clumsy Santa
description:
*******BEST Christmas GAME*******

Santa's Gifts Bag is now Empty!
He is Escaping form the people that are mad against him to get Gifts...

Help this Clumsy Santa in escaping from the Town...
Enjoy Christmas Holidays!

Because its all about Fun, entertainment & excitement...
